summary: The movie portrays Norway's most spectacular robbery, where 11 men occupied central Stavanger for twenty minutes and escaped with 57 million kroner (appx $10 million). A police officer was shot and killed.
cast: Marit Synnøve Berg|Frode Winther|Morten Larsen|Tov Sletta|Hege Kristin Kjærvoll Sunde|Thomas Berhane|André Eriksen|Francis Gamble|Morten Håland|Geir Høiseth|Jeton Jajovski|Pål Christian Madsen Kvam|Lirik Sahiti|Thomas Bechmann
title: Nokas
